metadata.title: CVE-2016-1982 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The remove_chunked_transfer_coding function in filters.c in Privoxy before3.0.24 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid readand crash) via crafted chunk-encoded content.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1982` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1').
